name: Baobab
body:
## Screen Shots:
![Screenshot1](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/moderndelta137/moderndelta137.github.io/master/assets/images/projects/Baobab_1_Big.png)
![Screenshot2](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/moderndelta137/moderndelta137.github.io/master/assets/images/projects/Baobab_2_Big.png)
![Screenshot3](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/moderndelta137/moderndelta137.github.io/master/assets/images/projects/Baobab_3_Big.png)

## Features:
+ Unity 2D Fast-Paced ACT game.
+ Self-made textures.
+ Customize your own character.
+ Wield two weapons simultaneously.
+ Tons of Weapons and Parts.
+ Cool Enemy design.


## Instructions:
An fast-paced 2D game developed using Unity with two of my friends. The game design was inspired by the peculiar plant Baobab decribed in the famous book The Little Prince.

In this game, you're acting as a robot trying to provent the rapid growing Baobab trees from swamping the planet. As a robot, the player can change its body parts and use different kinds of weapon. The game has a variety of items and weapons for at your disposal. Pick them up and fight some amazing Enemies.

The game's art is original and was solely done by my friend ZY. I'm responsible for the gameplay mechanism and animation. The game is scheduled to release on PC, Android and IOS once it's been completed.

###To play the demo: 
Download the .rar and unzip.
 
+ W-A-S-D to Move.
+ Q-E to Pick up/Throw away items with Left hand-Right hand.
+ J-K to use Left hand-Right hand items.
+ Space to Jump.
+ F to Kick.
+ G to use Attraction Beam.

###To view the source code: 
Download the project folder and open with Unity.(Require Unity 5.2.2 or higher)

## Authors and Contributors
Main Programmer: Dun Mao

Artist: ZY

Designer, Assistant Programmer: Z

Please do not use this work for commercial purposes, thank you.
